name: ugd10a
description: Collection of time, object and data utilities

scripts.testWithCoverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.prepare-build: npm run test && rimraf dist && tsc && copy README.md dist
scripts.publish-dev: npm run prepare-build && ts-node export-package && npm publish dist --tag dev
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-build && npm version patch && ts-node export-package && npm publish dist
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-build && npm version minor && ts-node export-package && npm publish dist
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-build && npm version major && ts-node export-package && npm publish dist

author: Jānis Radiņš
